description: Your family will love this healthier no-bake cheesecake tart with a creamy ricotta filling and a strawberry, basil and balsamic syrup topping.
name: Healthier No-Bake Strawberry & Basil Cheesecake Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.33 cup Woolworths toasted honey & cinnamon muesli
2 tsp thyme leaves (save 1 tsp sprigs to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chia seeds and 1/3 cup water in a bowl. Set aside for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until mixture has thickened.

Place muesli in a food processor and blitz until it resembles coarse breadcrumbs. Add chia seed mixture and spread, then blitz until well combined. Using damp hands, press mixture into a greased 22cm (3cm deep) loose-based fluted tart pan. Chill in fridge.

Meanwhile, reserve 2 tsp syrup. Place ricotta, milk and remaining syrup in cleaned food processor. Blitz until smooth. Transfer mixture to a bowl. Add thyme and stir to combine. Spread mixture into tart case. Refrigerate overnight or until base has set (see Tip).
Place vinegar and reserved syrup in a small frying pan over medium heat. Simmer for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened and syrupy. Cool.
Remove tart from pan. Top tart with strawberries, basil and extra thyme sprigs, then drizzle with balsamic syrup and serve immediately.
